translations: 多配偶的人；多配偶论者

sentences.sentence: The case has brought renewed attention to polygamists in America.
sentences.translation: 该案再次引起了人们对美国实行一夫多妻者的关注。

sentences.sentence: In Utah, discovering a band of polygamists hardly raises an eyebrow.
sentences.translation: 在犹他州发现一伙重婚者不足为奇。

sentences.sentence: Many polygamists moved to Mexico because of the relative liberality of Mexican law.
sentences.translation: 很多重婚者搬到了墨西哥，因为墨西哥法律对重婚比较宽松。
